Description:
The FHIR Observation resource defines measurements and assertions about a patient, including LDA-W (lines, drains, airways, and wound) data. Observation.Update allows the client to modify existing LDA-W data in the database, including LDA properties and LDA assessments.

This resource uses an E-Tag and an If-Match HTTP header.

If the update is successful, HTTP status code 200 will be returned. If the update is not successful, an operational outcome will be returned.
SampleRequest:
<Observation>

<category>

<coding>

<system value="http://open.epic.com/FHIR/STU3/StructureDefinition/observation-category" />

<code value="LDA" />

<display value="Line, Drains, and Airways" />

</coding>

<text value="Line, Drains, and Airways" />

</category>

<code>

<coding>

<system value="urn:oid:1.2.840.114350.1.13.861.1.7.2.707679" />

<code value="42674" />

<display value="HZL Wound LDA" />

</coding>

<text value="HZL Wound LDA" />

</code>

<subject>

<reference value="https://hostname/instance/api/FHIR/STU3/Patient/ew9Okvb9gsZXjzlK7YzqP1w3" />

<display value="Haruka Lufhir" />

</subject>

<context>

<reference value="https://hostname/instance/api/FHIR/STU3/Encounter/e5wRUdV7oHoL8VOeT.CdLnVfN7YsByGgW1GzM51mMDEw3" />

</context>

<component>

<code>

<coding>

<system value="urn:oid:1.2.840.114350.1.13.861.1.7.2.707679" />

<code value="700" />

<display value="Placement Date" />

</coding>

<text value="Placement Date" />

</code>

<valueDateTime value="2018-10-29" />

</component>

<component>

<code>

<coding>

<system value="urn:oid:1.2.840.114350.1.13.861.1.7.2.707679" />

<code value="701" />

<display value="Placement Time" />

</coding>

<text value="Placement Time" />

</code>

<valueTime value="08:00:00" />

</component>

<component>

<code>

<coding>

<system value="urn:oid:1.2.840.114350.1.13.861.1.7.2.707679" />

<code value="4572" />

<display value="FLOQA Left/Right Property Row" />

</coding>

<text value="FLOQA Left/Right Property Row" />

</code>

<valueCodeableConcept>

<coding>

<system value="urn:oid:1.2.840.114350.1.13.861.1.7.4.696784.98011" />

<code value="L" />

<display value="Left" />

</coding>

<text value="Left" />

</valueCodeableConcept>

</component>

<component>

<code>

<coding>

<system value="urn:oid:1.2.840.114350.1.13.861.1.7.2.707679" />

<code value="4577" />

<display value="FLOQA String Property Row" />

</coding>

<text value="FLOQA String Property Row" />

</code>

<valueString value="Haruka's painful wound" />

</component>

</Observation>

category.Name: category
category.Description:
The category is always "LDA".

This element can't be modified by Observation.Update.

code.Name: code
code.Description:
LOINC code, CADSR code, or encoded flowsheet ID. Either this element or category must be provided, but not both.

This element can't be modified by Observation.Update.

The code element value varies depending upon what is passed (for example, a flowsheet ID vs. a LOINC code). If using a flowsheet ID, the system value is different between Epic organizations, and it is also different between production and non-production environments for the same organization.

component.Name: component
component.Description:
LOINC code, CADSR code, or encoded flowsheet ID. Either this element or category must be provided, but not both.

The code element value varies depending upon what is passed (for example, a flowsheet ID vs. a LOINC code). If using a flowsheet ID, the system value is different between Epic organizations, and it is also different between production and non-production environments for the same organization.

context.Name: context
context.Description:
Reference to an encounter resource.

This element can't be modified by Observation.Update.

effectiveDateTime.Name: effectiveDateTime
effectiveDateTime.Description:
The prioritized instant.

This element can't be modified by Observation.Update.

effectivePeriod.Name: effectivePeriod
effectivePeriod.Description: Start instant and/or end instant of the LDA.

related.Name: related
related.Description: This element can't be modified by the Observation.Update.

target.Name: target
target.Description:
The parent LDA observation FHIR ID.

This element can't be modified by Observation.Update.

subject.Name: subject
subject.Description:
Reference to a patient resource.

This element can't be modified by Observation.Update.

valueQuantity.Name: valueQuantity
valueQuantity.Description: Value of the assessment. For image rows, a comma-delimited list of external DCS IDs is required.
